name: Sleeping Dragon King Chronicles
description: Start your journey as Ryuga, a young Japanese high school student that just didn't quite fit in with society. Orphaned at a young age, Ryuga had an intense time through school, where do not quite get along with the other students. Until the day he meets a new transfer student named Akira. After befriending Akira, he was targeted for bullying Ryuga. He stands up for himself and everything goes awry where a monster like dragon attacks everyone. He tries to defend Akira and ends up in a new world. Akira is separated from him. He meets strange new companions that will help him survive this new and dangerous world. Can you help him survive this new world? Welcome to the Isekai of Sleeping Dragon King Chronicles.
